changelog.md.Ajout d'option pour le seuil de cycle ch: Addition of option for the hot cycle threshold in order to allow the taking into account of the inertia
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option \"Seuil de cycle ou l: Addition of an option "Cycle threshold or heating is considered hot
changelog.md.Correction de bug sur le mode off du the: Bug correction on thermostat off mode
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option pour limiter la durée: Addition of an option to limit the duration of a second cycle to 100% of the time (allows to take into account the fact that the radiators are already hot)
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les commandes or: Correction of a bug on the orphan commands
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le off: Correction of a bug on the off
changelog.md.Mise à jour de la FAQ sur les soucis de: Update of the FAQ on the concerns of non display of actions / modes
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option \"Limite les cycles m: Addition of an option "Limits incessant on / off cycles (pellet, gas, fuel oil) and PID
changelog.md.Possibilité d'ajouter un message d'alert: Possibility to add an alert message if the thermostat has been suspended for more than XX minutes
changelog.md.Ajout en mode temporel d'un delta de con: Adding a set point delta in time mode
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le smart start s: Correction of a bug on the smart start if the calendar is deactivated after planning
changelog.md.Correction de bug sur le panel mobile: Bug correction on the mobile panel
changelog.md.Ajout d'un calcul de performance (kWh\/D: Adding a performance calculation (kWh / DJU) if a consumption command is given to the plugin
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la gestion des a: Correction of a bug on the management of temperature sensor failure alerts
changelog.md.Ajout d'un champs pour une commande d'hu: Addition of a field for a humidity control (only useful for the Google Smarthome plugin)
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la suspension du: Correction of a bug on the suspension of the thermostat when opening a window
changelog.md.Correction d'un warning dans le code: Correction of a warning in the code
changelog.md.Correction de bug sur les ouvertures\/fe: Bug correction on window openings / closings

index.md.Ce paramètre correspond au décalage cons: This parameter corresponds to the difference observed between the heating period (= heating is on) and the period when the temperature measured by the probe increases, divided by the length of the configured cycle.
